message: Let's make a deal! I take $7,000, you get $3,000. This is a generous offer considering the money will be worth less as time goes on - especially for you!
I'm willing to split the money more evenly.  Let's each take $6,000. This is a fair deal, and we can both walk away with a good amount.
Bob, time is running out!  My last offer was more than fair. I'll take $6,500 and you get $3,500.  Let's close this deal before the money is worth even less!
